scripts.graph:turbo: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const rawDir=path.resolve('dot/raw'); fs.mkdirSync(rawDir, { recursive: true }); const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json','utf8')); const name=pkg.name.replace(/[@\/]/g,'_'); const ts=new Date().toISOString().replace(/[-:]/g,'').replace(/\..+/, ''); const outPath=path.join(rawDir, `${name}_${ts}.dot`); const stdout=execSync('npx turbo run build --graph', { encoding: 'utf8' }); fs.writeFileSync(outPath, stdout);"
scripts.graph: pnpm run graph:turbo && pnpm run graph:merge
